description: Run a simulation of a spring-mass system and explore the effect of various factors on the period. Analyze data using the CODAP environment.
description_for_teacher:
Run a simulation of a spring-mass system and choose the variables to explore in this third activity in the InquirySpace sequence. Modeling this system expands the possibilities of experimentation to a wide range of factors. Will the model confirm the findings of the physical system investigated earlier? How will period be affected by gravity, spring constant, amplitude or damping? Use CODAP graphical analysis tools to answer your own questions, investigate this complex data and present your results.

(InquirySpace Activity 3 of 7.)
name: Spring and Mass Model (InquirySpace: 3)
